name: Demolition Mission
overview: Drop bombs on the buildings to blow them up, otherwise you will crash into them and die. An AMOS based game created by Roger North and published by Courbois Software in 1991. DEMOLITION MISSION was originally a licenceware game of the same name written in AMOS (incl. source code) and released on Berliner Spielekiste Disk #113 in 1990. That same year it was distributed outside Germany by various PD software libraries also (e.g. 17-Bit PD Disk #1747, Assassins PD Disk #688). Several months later, however, the Dutch language was added to the game and, ultimately, it was published commercially by Courbois Software during 1991.
